FactCheck: org verified that the photo in question is not of Mark Kelly. His campaign and several former classmates confirmed that he is not depicted in the photo.
The conservative news site: National File, published a report claiming to have obtained yearbook photos showing Mark Kelly dressed as Hitler. However, they provided no evidence to support this claim and did not include any sources linking Kelly to the photo.
The Kelly campaign issued a statement de: and five classmates also confirmed that the person in the Hitler costume is not Mark Kelly. The Arizona Republic published a story supporting Kelly's denial and that of four classmates.
